explanation.overview: 这些形容词都描述'高兴'的情绪，但在强度、持续时间和表现方式上有所不同。

details.meaning: 最通用的词，表示一般的快乐或满足
details.example: I'm happy with my new job.（我对新工作感到满意。）

details.meaning: 因特定事情而感到高兴，通常较短暂
details.example: I'm glad you could come to the party.（很高兴你能来参加聚会。）
The teacher was pleased with our progress.（老师对我们的进步感到满意。）
We were delighted by the surprise party.（我们对惊喜派对感到非常高兴。）

details.meaning: 开朗的，表现出快乐的情绪
details.example: She's always so cheerful in the morning.（她早上总是很开朗。）

details.meaning: 兴高采烈的，因成功或好消息而极度高兴
details.example: He was elated when he won the competition.（他赢得比赛后欣喜若狂。）
They were overjoyed at the birth of their baby.（他们对孩子的出生感到无比喜悦。）

details.meaning: 欢欣鼓舞的，常伴有公开庆祝
details.example: The fans were jubilant when their team won.（球队获胜时球迷们欢欣鼓舞。）

details.meaning: 感到愉悦的，通常因优雅或精致的事物
details.example: I was charmed by the little French café.（我被这家法国小咖啡馆迷住了。）

life_examples.happy: I'm happy to see you.（很高兴见到你。）
life_examples.glad: I'm glad the weather is nice.（很高兴天气不错。）
life_examples.pleased: We're pleased to announce the new product.（我们很高兴宣布新产品。）
life_examples.delighted: She was delighted with the gift.（她对礼物感到非常高兴。）
life_examples.cheerful: He gave a cheerful greeting.（他愉快地打招呼。）
life_examples.charmed: I'm charmed by your manners.（我被你的举止迷住了。）

life_examples.delighted: The bride was delighted with the wedding.（新娘对婚礼非常满意。）
life_examples.elated: The athletes were elated with their medals.（运动员们因奖牌而兴高采烈。）
life_examples.overjoyed: Parents were overjoyed at graduation.（毕业典礼上父母们欣喜若狂。）
life_examples.jubilant: The crowd was jubilant after the victory.（胜利后人群欢欣鼓舞。）
life_examples.charmed: Guests were charmed by the venue.（客人们被场地迷住了。）

common_errors.error: ❌ I'm overjoyed with this cup of coffee.
common_errors.correction: ✅ I'm pleased/delighted with this cup of coffee.（咖啡带来的愉悦用pleased/delighted）

common_errors.error: ❌ She's always so overjoyed in the morning.
common_errors.correction: ✅ She's always so cheerful in the morning.（早晨开朗用cheerful）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The whole nation was ___ when their team won the World Cup.
哪个词最适合描述'对精美礼物的反应'？
mini_test.explanation: 精美礼物带来的高兴用delighted

mini_test.question: 填空：She has a naturally ___ personality that brightens the office.
